title: Naked Determination: 41 Stories About Overcoming Fear
description: Alternate cover edition for 9780991272402Living a better life should be #fun.Life skills expert Gisela Hausmann delivers 40 hilarious, true stories how to reach your goals. Topics: basic skills, essential skills, personal development, Affairs_Sex_and_Love, professional life, money, rejection, your and our future, unexpected stories, and “So, where do we go from here?”Readers will be able to apply the tricks Gisela reveals immediately. The ebook edition won BRONZE at the eLit Awards 2012 (category inspirational/motivational)5***** at Readers Favorite
author: Gisela Hausmann
